arguments.description: Name of an executed query and column. Separate query name and column name with a period.
arguments.name: query_column

arguments.description:
A delimiter character to separate column data items.
            Default: comma (,).
arguments.name: delimiter

description:
Inserts a delimiter between each value in an executed query.
        CFML does not evaluate the arguments.
        A delimited list of the values of each record returned from an
        executed query
name: valuelist
